dataSource.description: The address of the notifier of the event in the asset (e.g. URL) so that a client can access the event on the asset.

eventGroupConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific configuration for the event. For OPC UA, this could include configuration like, publishingInterval, samplingInterval, and queueSize.

events.description: Array of events that are part of the asset. Each event can have per-event configuration.
